name: Gundam Breaker 2
description:
Gundam Breaker 2 is an action game developed by Bandai Namco Entertainment. It came out on 18-12-2014. Bandai Namco Entertainment published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Gundam Breaker 2 is available on PlayStation 3 and PS Vita.
It was scored by various.
